dao

Interface BudgetDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BudgetDB

    public interface BudgetDAO
    This class provides the specification of the methods available to create, get and update Budgets, Sections, SectionProducts, Annotations, Documents, Attachments and Covers. It is implemented in BudgetDB.
    Author:
    oscar

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String DEFAULT_NOTE 
      static float DEFAULT_TAXRATE 
      static int MAXRESULTS
      Maximum results that the class can give in an array.

      Creates a notification that relations the specified budget and salesperson.
      boolean addNotification(int salespersonId, java.lang.String budgetId, boolean otherAdministrators)
      Creates a notification for all the administrators but the salesperson specified that relations them with the specified budget.

      Creates a new product in a section of a budget in the database with a quantity of 1.

      Creates a new section of a budget in the database.

      Creates a new cover and returns the new ID of the cover.

      Creates a budget in the database with the specified author.

      Creates a budget in the database with the specified author, or an offer if isOffer.
      java.lang.String createBudget(User author, java.lang.String budgetIdFrom)
      Creates a budget in the database with the specified author and the specified budget from as they are in the same family.
      java.lang.String createBudget(User author, java.lang.String budgetIdFrom, boolean isOffer)
      Creates a budget in the database with the specified author, or an offer if isOffer, and the specified budget from as they are in the same family.

      Retrieves the budgets (up to a max, if the array returned is max+1 there are results not listed) assigned (if not others) or not (if others, this only should be used if the user can view all clients) with the specified search criteria.

      Retrieves the budgets (up to a max, if the length of the array is max there may be results not listed) assigned to a salesperson with the specified search criteria.

      Retrieves the list of all budgets and offers not completed by the author.
      Budget[] getNewBudgets(int salespersonId)
      Retrieves the list of all budgets notified as created (have creation date) by another author, and the salesperson is the specified.
      Budget[] getNewBudgets(int salespersonId, boolean others)
      Retrieves the list of all budgets notified as created (have creation date) by another author, and the salesperson is the specified (if not others) or different to the specified (if others).

      Retrieves the list of all offers notified as signed (have sign) by another administrator, and the salesperson is the specified.
      Budget[] getNewSignedOffers(int salespersonId, boolean others)
      Retrieves the list of all offers notified as signed (have sign) by another administrator, and the salesperson is the specified (if not others) or different to the specified (if others).
      int getNotificationCount(int salespersonId)
      Retrieves the sum of the number of incompleteBudgets whose salesperson is the author, offers not yet signed (if the user is an administrator) and notifications (include notifications of offers only if the user can view offers)

      Updates the budget with a new expiration date.

      Updates the budget setting if it has a global total o a spare total for each section.

      Updates the budget with a new final note.

      Updates a product in a section of a budget in the database to set its quantity to the specified.

      Updates the budget with a new tax rate.

      Updates the offer with a new creation date and sets the sign to the salesperson specified, so it makes the offer complete.

      Updates one or several products in a section of a budget in the database to order the specified product before or after the previous or the succeeding.

      Updates one or several sections of a budget in the database to order the specified section before or after the previous or the succeeding.

    • Field Detail

      • MAXRESULTS

        static final int MAXRESULTS
        Maximum results that the class can give in an array. If an array returned by this class is MAXRESULTS length, there may be results not given.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • getBudget

        Budget getBudget(java.lang.String budgetId)
        Retrieves the Budget with the specified budgetId from the database, null if not exists.
        Parameters:
        budgetId - The unique ID of the budget
        Returns:
        The budget that matches the ID

      • getBudgets

        Budget[] getBudgets(int salespersonId,
                    long from,
                    long to,
                    java.lang.String filter,
                    boolean expired)
        Retrieves the budgets (up to a max, if the length of the array is max there may be results not listed) assigned to a salesperson with the specified search criteria. The filter search if every word introduced by the user is contained in any of the following: The client number, address, town, province, country, postalCode, name, email, phone, person or notes, or the name or email of his assigned salesperson; the author name or email; the name of any section, product id, name or description that the budget contains; any annotation text, document or attachment name; the budget id, construction reference or note.
        Parameters:
        salespersonId - The ID of the salesperson assigned to the budgets
        from - Minimum creation date for the search
        to - Maximum creation date for the search
        filter - Words that will include the results
        expired - If true, will include expired budgets
        Returns:
        A list of budgets that match the parameters

      • getBudgets

        Budget[] getBudgets(int salespersonId,
                    boolean others,
                    long from,
                    long to,
                    java.lang.String filter,
                    boolean expired)
        Retrieves the budgets (up to a max, if the array returned is max+1 there are results not listed) assigned (if not others) or not (if others, this only should be used if the user can view all clients) with the specified search criteria. The filter search if every word introduced by the user is contained in any of the following: The client number, address, town, province, country, postalCode, name, email, phone, person or notes, or the name or email of his assigned salesperson; the author name or email; the name of any section, product id, name or description that the budget contains; any annotation text, document or attachment name; the budget id, construction reference or note.
        Parameters:
        salespersonId - The ID of the salesperson assigned to the budgets
        others - If true, will return the budgets NOT matching the salesperson
        from - Minimum creation date for the search
        to - Maximum creation date for the search
        filter - Words that will include the results
        expired - If true, will include expired budgets
        Returns:
        A list of budgets that match the parameters

      • getNotSignedOffers

        Budget[] getNotSignedOffers(int salespersonId)
        Retrieves the list of all offers completed waiting for the sign of an administrator whose salesperson is the specified. This method only should be called if the user can view offers.
        Parameters:
        salespersonId - The salesperson ID matching the salesperson
        Returns:
        List of completed offers not signed

      • getNotSignedOffers

        Budget[] getNotSignedOffers()
        Retrieves the list of all offers completed for clients of the salesperson waiting for the sign of an administrator. This method only should be called if the user is an administrator.
        Returns:
        A list of offers not signed with the specified salesperson

      • getIncompleteBudgets

        Budget[] getIncompleteBudgets(int authorId)
        Retrieves the list of all budgets and offers not completed by the author.
        Parameters:
        authorId - The ID of the creator
        Returns:
        A list of budgets and offers no completed by the salesperson

      • getNewBudgets

        Budget[] getNewBudgets(int salespersonId,
                       boolean others)
        Retrieves the list of all budgets notified as created (have creation date) by another author, and the salesperson is the specified (if not others) or different to the specified (if others).
        Parameters:
        salespersonId - The salesperson ID matching the salesperson
        others - If true, will return the budgets not matching the salesperson
        Returns:
        A list of budgets created by others for the salesperson

      • getNewBudgets

        Budget[] getNewBudgets(int salespersonId)
        Retrieves the list of all budgets notified as created (have creation date) by another author, and the salesperson is the specified.
        Parameters:
        salespersonId - The salesperson ID matching the salesperson
        Returns:
        A list of budgets created by others for the salesperson

      • getNewSignedOffers

        Budget[] getNewSignedOffers(int salespersonId)
        Retrieves the list of all offers notified as signed (have sign) by another administrator, and the salesperson is the specified.
        Parameters:
        salespersonId - The salesperson ID matching the salesperson
        Returns:
        A list of offers signed for the salesperson

      • getNewSignedOffers

        Budget[] getNewSignedOffers(int salespersonId,
                            boolean others)
        Retrieves the list of all offers notified as signed (have sign) by another administrator, and the salesperson is the specified (if not others) or different to the specified (if others).
        Parameters:
        salespersonId - The salesperson ID matching the salesperson
        others - If true, will return the budgets not matching the salesperson
        Returns:
        A list of offers signed for the salesperson

      • getNotificationCount

        int getNotificationCount(int salespersonId)
        Retrieves the sum of the number of incompleteBudgets whose salesperson is the author, offers not yet signed (if the user is an administrator) and notifications (include notifications of offers only if the user can view offers)
        Parameters:
        salespersonId - The unique ID of the salesperson
        Returns:
        The sum of budgets with notification or incomplete

                           java.lang.String budgetId)

                        java.lang.String budgetId,

        budgetId - The unique ID of the budget
        otherAdministrators - If true, the notifications are for all the administrators

      • addProduct

        boolean addProduct(java.lang.String budgetId,
                   int sectionId,
                   int productId)
        Creates a new product in a section of a budget in the database with a quantity of 1. Cannot be done if the budget is completed, or the offer signed. Returns true if it completes the operation.
        Parameters:
        budgetId - The ID of the budget
        sectionId - The ID of the sections
        productId - The ID of the product
        Returns:
        True if the product is inserted to the section

      • removeProduct

        boolean removeProduct(java.lang.String budgetId,
                      int sectionId,
                      int productId)
        Removes a product in a section of a budget from the database. Cannot be done if the budget is completed, or the offer signed. Returns true if it completes the operation.
        Parameters:
        budgetId - The ID of the budget
        sectionId - The ID of the sections
        productId - The ID of the product
        Returns:
        True if the product is removed from the section

      • sortProduct

        boolean sortProduct(java.lang.String budgetId,
                    int sectionId,
                    int productId,
                    boolean after)
        Updates one or several products in a section of a budget in the database to order the specified product before or after the previous or the succeeding. Cannot be done if the budget is completed, or the offer signed. Returns true if it completes the operation.
        Parameters:
        budgetId - The ID of the budget
        sectionId - The ID of the sections
        productId - The ID of the product
        after - True to order after the next product, in the other case order before the previous
        Returns:
        True if the product line is updated

      • setQuantity

        boolean setQuantity(java.lang.String budgetId,
                    int sectionId,
                    int productId,
                    float quantity)
        Updates a product in a section of a budget in the database to set its quantity to the specified. Cannot be done if the budget is completed, or the offer signed. Returns true if it completes the operation.
        Parameters:
        budgetId - The ID of the budget
        sectionId - The ID of the sections
        productId - The ID of the product
        quantity - The units of product
        Returns:
        True if it is updated

      • setDiscounts

        boolean setDiscounts(java.lang.String budgetId,
                     int sectionId,
                     int productId,
                     float discount1,
                     float discount2,
                     float discount3)
        Updates a product in a section of an offer in the database to set its discounts to the specified. Cannot be done if the budget is completed, or the offer signed. Returns true if it completes the operation.
        Parameters:
        budgetId - The ID of the budget
        sectionId - The ID of the sections
        productId - The ID of the product
        discount1 - A percentage of discount
        discount2 - A percentage of discount
        discount3 - A percentage of discount
        Returns:
        True if the product line is updated

        Returns:

      • addSection

        int addSection(java.lang.String budgetId)
        Creates a new section of a budget in the database. Returns the ID of the new section
        Parameters:
        budgetId - The ID of the budget
        Returns:
        The ID of the new section

      • addSection

        int addSection(java.lang.String budgetId,
               java.lang.String name)
        Creates a new section of a budget in the database with name. Cannot be done if the budget is completed, or the offer signed.
        Parameters:
        budgetId - The ID of the budget
        name - The title of the section
        Returns:
        The ID of the new section

      • removeSection

        boolean removeSection(java.lang.String budgetId,
                      int sectionId)
        Removes a section of a budget from the database. It cannot remove the section if there are products. Cannot be done if the budget is completed, or the offer signed. Returns true if it completes the operation.
        Parameters:
        budgetId - The ID of the budget
        sectionId - The ID of the section in the budget
        Returns:
        True if the section is removed from the budget

      • sortSection

        boolean sortSection(java.lang.String budgetId,
                    int sectionId,
                    boolean after)
        Updates one or several sections of a budget in the database to order the specified section before or after the previous or the succeeding. Cannot be done if the budget is completed, or the offer signed. Returns true if it completes the operation.
        Parameters:
        budgetId - The ID of the budget
        sectionId - The ID of the section in the budget
        after - True to order after the next section, in the other case order before the previous
        Returns:
        True if it is updated

      • renameSection

        boolean renameSection(java.lang.String budgetId,
                      int sectionId,
                      java.lang.String name)
        Updates a section of a budget with a new name. Cannot be done if the budget is completed, or the offer signed. Returns true if it completes the operation.
        Parameters:
        budgetId - The ID of the budget
        sectionId - The ID of the section in the budget
        name - The new title of the section
        Returns:
        True if the section is updated

      • sortAttachment

        boolean sortAttachment(java.lang.String budgetId,
                       int attachmentId,
                       boolean after)
        Removes the specified attachment of the budget in the database. Returns true if it completes the operation. Updates one or several attachments of a budget in the database to order the specified before or after the previous or the succeeding. Returns true if it completes the operation.
        Parameters:
        budgetId - The ID of the budget
        attachmentId - The ID of the attachment
        after - True to order after the next product, in the other case order before the previous
        Returns:
        True if the attachment is removed from the budget

      • createBudget

        java.lang.String createBudget(User author,
                              boolean isOffer)
        Creates a budget in the database with the specified author, or an offer if isOffer. Returns the budget ID.
        Parameters:
        author - The user that is creating the budget
        isOffer - If it is true, the budget is an offer
        Returns:
        The ID of the new budget

      • createBudget

        java.lang.String createBudget(User author)
        Creates a budget in the database with the specified author. Returns the budget ID.
        Parameters:
        author - The user that is creating the budget
        Returns:
        The ID of the new budget

      • createBudget

        java.lang.String createBudget(User author,
                              java.lang.String budgetIdFrom,
                              boolean isOffer)
        Creates a budget in the database with the specified author, or an offer if isOffer, and the specified budget from as they are in the same family. Returns the budget ID.
        Parameters:
        author - The user that is creating the budget
        budgetIdFrom - The ID of the budget in the same family
        isOffer - If it is true, the budget is an offer
        Returns:
        The ID of the new budget

      • createBudget

        java.lang.String createBudget(User author,
                              java.lang.String budgetIdFrom)
        Creates a budget in the database with the specified author and the specified budget from as they are in the same family. Returns the budget ID.
        Parameters:
        author - The user that is creating the budget
        budgetIdFrom - The ID of the budget in the same family
        Returns:
        The ID of the new budget

      • setClient

        boolean setClient(java.lang.String budgetId,
                  int clientId)
        Updates the budget with a new client. The budget cannot be completed, or the offer signed. Returns true if it completes the operation.
        Parameters:
        budgetId - The ID of the budget
        clientId - The ID of the client assigned to the budget
        Returns:
        True if the budget is updated

      • setConstructionRef

        boolean setConstructionRef(java.lang.String budgetId,
                           java.lang.String constructionRef)
        Updates the budget with a new construction reference. The budget cannot be completed, or the offer signed. Returns true if it completes the operation.
        Parameters:
        budgetId - The ID of the budget
        constructionRef - The construction reference
        Returns:
        True if the budget is updated

      • setExpirationDate

        boolean setExpirationDate(java.lang.String budgetId,
                          long date)
        Updates the budget with a new expiration date. The budget cannot be completed, or the offer signed. Returns true if it completes the operation.
        Parameters:
        budgetId - The ID of the budget
        date - The new expiration date, in ms
        Returns:
        True if the budget is updated

      • setNote

        boolean setNote(java.lang.String budgetId,
                java.lang.String note)
        Updates the budget with a new final note. The budget cannot be completed, or the offer signed. Returns true if it completes the operation.
        Parameters:
        budgetId - The ID of the budget
        note - The new note
        Returns:
        True if the budget is updated

      • setTaxRate

        boolean setTaxRate(java.lang.String budgetId,
                   float taxRate)
        Updates the budget with a new tax rate. The budget cannot be completed, or the offer signed. Returns true if it completes the operation.
        Parameters:
        budgetId - The ID of the budget
        taxRate - The new tax rate
        Returns:
        True if the budget is updated

      • setGlobalTotal

        boolean setGlobalTotal(java.lang.String budgetId,
                       boolean hasGlobalTotal)
        Updates the budget setting if it has a global total o a spare total for each section. The budget cannot be completed, or the offer signed. Returns true if it completes the operation.
        Parameters:
        budgetId - The ID of the budget
        hasGlobalTotal - If true, all the sections are part of the total of the budget
        Returns:
        True if the budget is updated

      • createBudget

        boolean createBudget(java.lang.String budgetId,
                     long creationDate)
        Updates the budget with a new creation date, so it makes the budget complete. The budget cannot be completed, or the offer signed before. Returns true if it completes the operation.
        Parameters:
        budgetId - The ID of the budget
        creationDate - The new creation date
        Returns:
        True if the budget is updated

      • signOffer

        boolean signOffer(java.lang.String budgetId,
                  int salespersonId,
                  long date)
        Updates the offer with a new creation date and sets the sign to the salesperson specified, so it makes the offer complete. The budget cannot be completed, or the offer signed before. Returns true if it completes the operation.
        Parameters:
        budgetId - The ID of the budget
        salespersonId - The ID of the signer
        date - The new creation date
        Returns:
        True if the budget is updated
